column4: hi helpers - newbie here.  i don't know what i did but my 12.04 LTS running on an Acer Aspire One has lost it's Unity launcher and top menu bar.  I don't know how to get them back.  Any thoughts?
- unity--reset doesn't work .  Compiz (core) = warn: failed to receive configureNotify event on 0x2400387
install a 2d session as we debug it will get you an interface at least
